title: Ripley's Fun Facts & Silly Stories 4
description: Filled with goofy facts, strange tales, and incredible photos, readers ages 7 and up will love Fun Facts & Silly Stories 4, the latest in Ripley’s Believe It or Not's best-selling children’s series! With all-new, all-real, kid-friendly stories not found in any other Ripley's book, youngsters will "ooh," "ahh" and giggle at every page as they build their reading skills. Perfect for both the family library and the classroom, Fun Facts & Silly Stories 4 is sure to please!
author: Ripley Entertainment Inc.
